game.l_dis:
Riddle School 5 – Escape the Alien Spaceship

Riddle School 5 is the final point-and-click adventure in the series. Players guide Phil Eggtree as he wakes up aboard an alien spaceship and must solve puzzles, combine items, and enter the dreams of his friends to save them and stop an alien plot.

What is Riddle School 5?

Riddle School 5 concludes the adventures of Phil Eggtree. Players navigate the alien ship, interact with alien technology, collect and combine items, and enter dreams to rescue friends like Phred, Smiley, and Zach, ultimately thwarting the aliens’ scheme to freeze Earth.

How to Play Riddle School 5?

  • Point-and-Click: Click around the spaceship and dream environments to interact with objects and characters.
  • Collect and Combine Items: Solve puzzles by using collected objects in creative ways.
  • Enter Dreams: Navigate dream sequences to rescue friends and gather key items.
  • Solve Puzzles: Overcome obstacles, unlock doors, and use logic to advance the story.
  • Complete the Story: Save Phil’s friends and stop the alien plot to freeze Earth.

Why Play Riddle School 5 Unblocked?

Experience the thrilling conclusion of the Riddle School series online without restrictions, with clever puzzles, humor, and engaging point-and-click gameplay.

Key Features

  • Alien Spaceship Setting: Explore creative environments aboard the alien ship.
  • Puzzle Adventure: Collect items, combine tools, and solve complex puzzles.
  • Dream Sequences: Enter friends’ dreams to rescue them and gather crucial information.
  • Series Finale: The last game in the Riddle School series with a complete story arc.
  • Unblocked Online: Play anywhere directly in your browser.

Can You Stop the Aliens?

Test your wits in Riddle School 5 by solving puzzles, rescuing friends, and preventing Earth from being frozen!
